attributes.action: Save the qe2 and press dubai to look after her
attributes.additional_details:
The greatest ship to have sailed the sea,Since 2008 the Qe2 has been sat in dubai awaiting transformation into a floating hotel. As of yet none of the plans have come to fruition.
She is now slowly rotting away in dubai drydocks, under extreme heat and lack of maintainance. Pictures have come to light recently obtained by louis de sousa showing  how bad it is getting and how sad the ship now looks. The owners in dubai seem to ignore all the questions her fans ask, we need the government to press the leaders of dubai to get them to either release the ship or look after her before its too late.
